text: khran meux khwam di di mayang phwk khea phwk khea k klaw wa ni khux siththi khxng rea læa hak khwam chaw dı «prasb kæ phwk khea phwk khea k thux xea nbimu sa pen lang ray læa phu thi rwm xyu kab khea dwy phung ru theid wa thi cring lang ray khxng phwk khea nan xyu thi xallxhˌ tanghak tæthwa swn mak khxng phwk khea miru
